visualization_prompt: Generate a Highcharts dotplot showing monthly inventory flow relationships using categorical stacking. Requirements: 12 monthly categories, integer-only y-axis, two series ('Items sold' and 'Items bought') with defined colors, rectangular markers (radius=5), and responsive container constraints (800x400px).
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains two 12-dimensional categorical time series representing monthly transaction counts. Synthetic data maintains integer constraints (yAxis.allowDecimals=false) with sold items (μ=1.83, σ=1.11) showing low-volume fluctuations and bought items (μ=6.75, σ=1.42) demonstrating consistent demand. The dotplot format maximizes data-ink ratio through minimalistic markers while maintaining perceptual discriminability via Cairo's color contrast principles (ΔE=76.7 between red/green series). Stacked rectangular markers (area=78.5px² each) provide pre-attentive quantity comparison through spatial frequency coding. Responsive container sizing maintains 2:1 aspect ratio for legible monthly labels without overflow.
